EmailTemplate.description: A simple email to send a run date change to merchants
EmailTemplate.name: Run Date Change
EmailTemplate.subject: DealChicken Run Date Change
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {!Contact.FirstName}, Thank you again for partnering with DealChicken for the following promotion: {!Opportunity.DC_Description__c} We would like to re-schedule your promotion from {!Opportunity.DC_Run_Date__c} to {!Opportunity.DC_End_Date__c}. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out to the DealChicken Team. Thanks. DealChicken Merchant Loyalty Team
